sys_documentation.hint: Choose a name that briefly describes what your flow does. Only users with access to Flow Designer can see this name.
sys_documentation.label: Flow Name
sys_documentation.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_a6008d5747290210fd54a09f016d4317

sys_documentation.hint: If you want to temporarily elevate the permissions of the user who triggers the flow, select System User. Selecting System User is less secure but can prevent permissions errors that cause your flow to stop running.
sys_documentation.label: Run as
sys_documentation.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_a6008d5747290210fd54a09f016d4317

sys_documentation.hint: Describe how your flow automates work for your app. Only users with access to Flow Designer can see this description.
sys_documentation.label: Flow Description
sys_documentation.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_a6008d5747290210fd54a09f016d4317

sys_documentation.hint: Select roles that you want to temporarily assign to the user who triggers your flow.
sys_documentation.label: Run with roles
sys_documentation.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_a6008d5747290210fd54a09f016d4317

sys_documentation.hint: Choose whether other users with Flow Designer access can edit your flow (No protection), or if your flow should be read-only.
sys_documentation.label: Protection
sys_documentation.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_a6008d5747290210fd54a09f016d4317
